EmailTemplate.subject: NCR Aloha Configuration Center Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for being a valued NCR customer We are inviting a select number of customers to participate in a brief survey about Aloha Configuration Center where you configure pricing, menus, set up employees, etc. As a new customer, we really want to hear from you so we can better meet your needs. These survey results will be used to influence our product roadmap. Below is a link to a brief survey with 10 questions that should take no more than 8 minutes of your time to complete. We know your time is precious, and we thank you in advance for taking time to share your honest feedback.
